00030 #include "iconsettings.h"
00031 
00032 IconSettings::IconSettings(bool newIcon, QString prefix_id, QString prefix_dir, QString dir_id, QString icon_name, QString winedll_path, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00033 {
00034     /*
00035      ** This functions is constructor for IconSettings dialog
00036      *
00037      * Args:
00038      * @newIcon -- This define which type of dialog we'l use "New Icon" or "Edit Icon"
00039      * @p_id    -- PrefixId
00040      * @p_id    -- PrefixId
00041      */
00042     setupUi(this);
00043 
00044     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00045     settings.beginGroup("app");
00046     loadThemeIcons(settings.value("theme").toString());
00047     settings.endGroup();
00048 
00049     settings.beginGroup("icotool");
00050     WRESTOOL_BIN = settings.value("wrestool").toString();
00051     ICOTOOL_BIN = settings.value("icotool").toString();
00052     settings.endGroup();
00053 
00054     if (prefix_dir.isEmpty()){
00055         prefix_dir.append(QDir::homePath());
00056         prefix_dir.append("/.wine/drive_c/");
00057     } else {
00058         prefix_dir.append("/drive_c/");
00059     }
00060 
00061     this->prefix_id=prefix_id;
00062     this->prefix_dir=prefix_dir;
00063     this->dir_id=dir_id;
00064     this->iconName=icon_name;
00065     this->newIcon=newIcon;
00066 
00067     switch (newIcon){
00068         case TRUE:
00069             lblCaption->setText(tr("Adding new icon"));
00070             setWindowTitle(tr("Adding new icon"));
00071         break;
00072         case FALSE:
00073             lblCaption->setText(tr("Icon settings"));
00074             setWindowTitle(tr("Icon settings"));
00075             settings.beginGroup("app");
00076                 getIconReccord(settings.value("theme").toString());
00077             settings.endGroup();
00078         break;
00079     }
00080 
00081     connect(twbGeneral, SIGNAL(currentChanged(int)), this, SLOT(ResizeContent(int)));
00082     connect(cmdAdd, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdAdd_Click()));
00083     connect(cmdGetProgram, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdGetProgram_Click()));
00084     connect(cmdGetWorkDir, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdGetWorkDir_Click()));
00085     connect(cmdGetIcon, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdGetIcon_Click()));
00086     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdCancel_Click()));
00087     connect(cmdOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdOk_Click()));
00088 
00089     connect(cbUseConsole, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, SLOT(cbUseConsole_stateChanged(int)));
00090 
00091     twDlls->installEventFilter(this);
00092 
00093     getWineDlls(winedll_path);
00094 
00095 
00096 
00097     return;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void IconSettings::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath){
00101     QPixmap pixmap;
00102 
00103     if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/exec.png").arg(themePath))){
00104         pixmap.load(":data/exec.png");
00105     }
00106 
00107     lblLogo->setPixmap(pixmap);
00108 
00109     cmdGetProgram->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00110     cmdGetWorkDir->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00111 
00112     cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/exec_wine.png", themePath));
00113 
00114     return;
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 QIcon IconSettings::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00119     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00120     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00121 
00122     QIcon icon;
00123 
00124     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00125         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00126         if (icon.isNull()){
00127             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00128         }
00129     } else {
00130         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00131     }
00132 
00133     return icon;
00134 }
00135 
00136 void IconSettings::getIconReccord(QString themePath){
00137     QSqlQuery query;
00138 
00139     if (!dir_id.isEmpty()){
00140         query.exec(tr("SELECT name, exec, cmdargs, icon_path, desc, display, winedebug, useconsole, override, id, wrkdir, desktop, nice FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=%1 AND dir_id=%2 and name=\"%3\"") .arg(prefix_id) .arg(dir_id) .arg(iconName));
00141     } else {
00142         query.exec(tr("SELECT name, exec, cmdargs, icon_path, desc, display, winedebug, useconsole, override, id, wrkdir, desktop, nice FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=%1 AND name=\"%2\" AND dir_id ISNULL") .arg(prefix_id) .arg(iconName));
00143     }
00144 
00145     query.first();
00146 
00147     txtName->setText(query.value(0).toString());
00148     txtProgramPath->setText(query.value(1).toString());
00149     txtCmdArgs->setText(query.value(2).toString());
00150 
00151     iconPath.clear();
00152 
00153 
00154 
00155     if (!query.value(3).toString().isEmpty()){
00156         if (QFile(query.value(3).toString()).exists()){
00157             cmdGetIcon->setIcon (QIcon(query.value(3).toString()));
00158             iconPath=query.value(3).toString();
00159         } else {
00160             iconPath=query.value(3).toString();
00161             if (iconPath=="wineconsole"){
00162                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/wineconsole.png", themePath));
00163             } else if (iconPath=="regedit"){
00164                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/regedit.png", themePath));
00165             } else if (iconPath=="wordpad"){
00166                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/notepad.png", themePath));
00167             } else if (iconPath=="winecfg"){
00168                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/winecfg.png", themePath));
00169             } else if (iconPath=="uninstaller"){
00170                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/uninstaller.png", themePath));
00171             } else if (iconPath=="eject"){
00172                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/eject.png", themePath));
00173             } else if (iconPath=="explorer"){
00174                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/explorer.png", themePath));
00175             } else {
00176                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/exec_wine.png", themePath));
00177                 iconPath="";
00178             }
00179         }
00180     }
00181 
00182     txtDesc->setText(query.value(4).toString());
00183     txtDisplay->setText(query.value(5).toString());
00184     txtWinedebug->setText(query.value(6).toString());
00185     txtWorkDir->setText(query.value(10).toString());
00186     txtDesktopSize->setText(query.value(11).toString());
00187     spinNice->setValue(query.value(12).toInt());
00188 
00189     if (query.value(7).toString()=="1"){
00190         cbUseConsole->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
00191         txtWinedebug->setEnabled(TRUE);
00192     } else {
00193         cbUseConsole->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00194         txtWinedebug->setEnabled(FALSE);
00195     }
00196 
00197     QStringList override = query.value(8).toString().split(";");
00198 
00199     QString overrideorder;
00200 
00201     for (int i=0; i<override.count()-1; i++){
00202 
00203         QStringList list2 = override.at(i).split("=");
00204             twDlls->insertRow (0);
00205             QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(list2.at(0));
00206             twDlls->setItem(0, 0, newItem);
00207             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00208 
00209             if (list2.at(1)=="n")
00210                 overrideorder = tr("Native");
00211             if (list2.at(1)=="b")
00212                 overrideorder = tr("Buildin");
00213             if (list2.at(1)=="n,b")
00214                 overrideorder = tr("Native, Buildin");
00215             if (list2.at(1)=="b,n")
00216                 overrideorder = tr("Buildin, Native");
00217 
00218 
00219             newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(overrideorder);
00220             twDlls->setItem(0, 1, newItem);
00221             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00222     }
00223 
00224     iconId = query.value(9).toString();
00225 
00226     return;
00227 }
00228 
00229 void IconSettings::getWineDlls(QString winedll_path){
00230 
00231     if (winedll_path.isEmpty()){
00232         QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00233         settings.beginGroup("wine");
00234             winedll_path=settings.value("WineLibs").toString();
00235         settings.endGroup();
00236     }
00237 
00238     QDir dir(winedll_path);
00239     dir.setFilter(QDir::Files | QDir::Hidden | QDir::NoSymLinks);
00240 
00241     QFileInfoList list = dir.entryInfoList();
00242     for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00243         QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00244         if (fileInfo.fileName().indexOf(".dll.so")>=0){
00245             cboxDlls->addItem ( fileInfo.fileName().left(fileInfo.fileName().length()-3));
00246         }
00247     }
00248 
00249     cboxDlls->setMaxVisibleItems (10);
00250 
00251     return;
00252 }
00253 
00254 bool IconSettings::eventFilter( QObject *object, QEvent *event )
00255 {
00256    //  firstly, check whether the object is the QTableWidget and if it's a mouse press event
00257     if (object == twDlls)
00258         if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress)
00259         {   // if yes, we need to cast the event
00260         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = static_cast<QKeyEvent*>(event);
00261         if (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Delete)
00262             twDlls->removeRow(twDlls->currentRow());
00263 
00264         return true;
00265         }
00266 
00267     return QWidget::eventFilter(object, event);
00268 }

00271 void IconSettings::ResizeContent(int TabIndex){
00272 
00273     switch (TabIndex){
00274         case 1:
00275             twDlls->resizeRowsToContents();
00276             twDlls->resizeColumnsToContents();
00277             twDlls->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
00278         break;
00279     }
00280 
00281     return;
00282 }
00283 
00284 void IconSettings::resizeEvent (QResizeEvent){
00285     ResizeContent(2);
00286     return;
00287 }

00293 void IconSettings::cbUseConsole_stateChanged(int){
00294     switch(cbUseConsole->checkState()){
00295         case Qt::PartiallyChecked:
00296             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(TRUE);
00297         break;
00298         case Qt::Checked:
00299             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(TRUE);
00300         break;
00301         case Qt::Unchecked:
00302             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(FALSE);
00303         break;
00304     }
00305 
00306     return;
00307 }

00313 void IconSettings::cmdGetWorkDir_Click(){
00314 
00315     QString searchPath=prefix_dir;
00316     QString fileName;
00317 
00318     if ((!txtProgramPath->text().isEmpty()) and (QDir().exists(txtProgramPath->text()))){
00319         searchPath=txtProgramPath->text().left(txtProgramPath->text().length() - txtProgramPath->text().split("/").last().length());;
00320     }
00321 
00322     if (!QDir(searchPath).exists()){
00323         if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists()){
00324            searchPath=prefix_dir;
00325         } else {
00326            searchPath=QDir::homePath();
00327         }
00328      }
00329 
00330     QList<QUrl> prefix_urls;
00331     // Adding side bar urls for FileOpen dialogs
00332     if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists())
00333        prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(prefix_dir);
00334 
00335     if ((searchPath != prefix_dir) && (QDir(searchPath).exists()))
00336         prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(searchPath);
00337 
00338     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::homePath());
00339     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::rootPath());
00340 
00341     QFileDialog dialog(this);
00342       dialog.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Hidden);
00343 
00344       dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::Directory);
00345       dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Open Directory"));
00346       dialog.setDirectory(searchPath);
00347         // This option works only it qt 4.5. In fact this not works correctly with QDir::Hidden,  so I comment it out for a some  time
00348         // dialog.setOption(QFileDialog::ShowDirsOnly, true);
00349 
00350       dialog.setSidebarUrls(prefix_urls);
00351 
00352     //fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open image file"), searchPath, tr("Image and Win32 binary files (*.png *.jpg *.gif *.bmp *.exe *.dll);;Image files (*.png *.jpg *.gif *.bmp);;Win32 Executable (*.exe);;Win32 Shared libraies (*.dll);;Win32 Executable and Shared libraies (*.exe *.dll)") );
00353 
00354      if (dialog.exec())
00355         fileName = dialog.selectedFiles().first();
00356 
00357     //QString fileName = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Open Directory"), selDir, QFileDialog::DontResolveSymlinks);
00358 
00359     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00360         txtWorkDir->setText(fileName);
00361     }
00362     return;
00363 }
00364 
00365 void IconSettings::cmdAdd_Click(){
00366     if (!cboxDlls->currentText().isEmpty()){
00367         twDlls->insertRow (0);
00368         QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(cboxDlls->currentText());
00369         twDlls->setItem(0, 0, newItem);
00370         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00371         newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(cboxOveride->currentText());
00372         twDlls->setItem(0, 1, newItem);
00373         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00374     }
00375 
00376     twDlls->resizeRowsToContents();
00377     twDlls->resizeColumnsToContents();
00378     twDlls->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
00379     return;
00380 }
00381 
00382 void IconSettings::cmdGetProgram_Click(){
00383     QString fileName;
00384     QString searchPath=prefix_dir;
00385 
00386     if (!txtProgramPath->text().isEmpty()){
00387         if (!txtWorkDir->text().isEmpty()){
00388         searchPath=txtWorkDir->text();
00389         } else {
00390         searchPath=txtProgramPath->text().left(txtProgramPath->text().length() - txtProgramPath->text().split("/").last().length());;
00391         }
00392     }
00393 
00394     if ((!QDir(searchPath).exists()) or (searchPath.isEmpty())){
00395         if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists()){
00396            searchPath=prefix_dir;
00397         } else {
00398            searchPath=QDir::homePath();
00399         }
00400      }
00401 
00402     QList<QUrl> prefix_urls;
00403     // Adding side bar urls for FileOpen dialogs
00404     if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists())
00405        prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(prefix_dir);
00406 
00407     if ((searchPath != prefix_dir) && (QDir(searchPath).exists()))
00408         prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(searchPath);
00409 
00410     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::homePath());
00411     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::rootPath());
00412 
00413     QFileDialog dialog(this);
00414       dialog.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Hidden | QDir::Files );
00415       dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Open Exe file"));
00416       dialog.setDirectory(searchPath);
00417       dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFile);
00418       dialog.setNameFilter(tr("Exe files (*.exe)"));
00419       dialog.setSidebarUrls(prefix_urls);
00420 
00421      if (dialog.exec())
00422         fileName = dialog.selectedFiles().first();
00423 
00424     //QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open Exe file"), selDir, tr("Exe files (*.exe)"));
00425 
00426     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00427             QStringList list1 = fileName.split("/");
00428             txtName->setText(list1.last().left(list1.last().length() - list1.last().split(".").last().length() - 1));
00429             txtProgramPath->setText(fileName);
00430 
00431             QString wrkDir;
00432             wrkDir = fileName.left(fileName.length() - list1.last().length());
00433             txtWorkDir->setText(wrkDir);
00434     }
00435 
00436     return;
00437 }
00438 
00439 void IconSettings::cmdGetIcon_Click(){
00440 
00441     QString fileName, searchPath;
00442 
00443     if ((!txtWorkDir->text().isEmpty()) and (QDir(txtWorkDir->text()).exists())){
00444         searchPath = txtWorkDir->text();
00445     } else {
00446         if ((!iconPath.isEmpty()) and (QFile(iconPath).exists())){
00447             searchPath = iconPath;
00448         } else {
00449             if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists()){
00450                searchPath=prefix_dir;
00451             } else {
00452                searchPath=QDir::homePath();
00453             }
00454         }
00455     }
00456 
00457     QList<QUrl> prefix_urls;
00458     // Adding side bar urls for FileOpen dialogs
00459     if (QDir(prefix_dir).exists())
00460        prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(prefix_dir);
00461 
00462     if ((searchPath != prefix_dir) && (QDir(searchPath).exists()))
00463         prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(searchPath);
00464 
00465     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::homePath());
00466     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::rootPath());
00467 
00468     QFileDialog dialog(this);
00469       dialog.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Hidden | QDir::Files );
00470       dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFile);
00471       dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Open image file"));
00472       dialog.setDirectory(searchPath);
00473         #ifndef WITH_ICOTOOLS
00474         dialog.setNameFilter(tr("Image files (*.png *.jpg *.gif *.bmp *.xpm)"));
00475         #else
00476         dialog.setNameFilter(tr("Image and Win32 binary files (*.png *.jpg *.gif *.bmp *.xpm *.exe *.dll);;Image files (*.png *.jpg *.gif *.bmp *.xpm);;Win32 Executable (*.exe);;Win32 Shared libraies (*.dll);;Win32 Executable and Shared libraies (*.exe *.dll)"));
00477         #endif
00478       dialog.setSidebarUrls(prefix_urls);
00479 
00480      if (dialog.exec())
00481         fileName = dialog.selectedFiles().first();
00482 
00483     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00484         if ((fileName.toLower().right(3)!="exe") && (fileName.toLower().right(3)!="dll")){
00485             cmdGetIcon->setIcon (QIcon(fileName));
00486         } else {
00487 
00488             QStringList args;
00489             args << "-x";
00490             args << "-t" << "14";
00491 
00492             QString tmpDir;
00493             QStringList list1 = fileName.split("/");
00494 
00495             tmpDir.append(QDir::homePath());
00496             tmpDir.append("/.config/");
00497             tmpDir.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00498             tmpDir.append("/tmp/");
00499             tmpDir.append(list1.last());
00500 
00501             QDir tmp(tmpDir);
00502             tmp.setFilter(QDir::Files | QDir::Hidden | QDir::NoSymLinks);
00503             QFileInfoList list = tmp.entryInfoList();
00504 
00505             if (tmp.exists(tmpDir)){
00506                 for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00507                     QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00508                     if (!tmp.remove(fileInfo.filePath()))
00509                         qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete files at: "<<fileInfo.filePath();
00510                 }
00511             } else {
00512                 if (!tmp.mkdir(tmpDir)){
00513                     qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't create temp directory at: "<<tmpDir;
00514                 }
00515             }
00516 
00517             args << "-o" << tmpDir;
00518             args << fileName;
00519 
00520             Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, WRESTOOL_BIN, QDir::homePath(), tr("Exporting icon from binary file.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Exporting icon"));
00521 
00522             if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00523             //icotool -x -o ./regedit.png --width=32 --height=32 ./regedit.exe_14_100_0.ico
00524                 args.clear();
00525                 args << "-x";
00526 
00527                 // Updating file index
00528                 list = tmp.entryInfoList();
00529 
00530                 //Creating file list for converting
00531                 for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00532                     QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00533                     if (fileInfo.fileName().right(3)=="ico")
00534                         args << fileInfo.filePath();
00535                 }
00536 
00537                 args << "-o" << tr("%1/").arg(tmpDir);
00538 
00539                 //Converting ico files to png
00540 
00541                 //Look here, this function checks is some icons found, or not. 5 -- is default number of arguments,
00542                 //if more -- then we have some ico file to convert
00543                 if (args.size()>=4){
00544                     exportProcess = new Process(args, ICOTOOL_BIN, QDir::homePath(), tr("Convering icon from binary file.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Converting icon"));
00545                     if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00546                         IconsView *iconsView = new IconsView(tmpDir);
00547                         if (iconsView->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00548                             fileName=iconsView->selectedFile;
00549                             cmdGetIcon->setIcon (QIcon(fileName));
00550                         } else {
00551                             fileName.clear();
00552                         }
00553                     }
00554                 } else {
00555                     IconsView *iconsView = new IconsView(tmpDir);
00556                     if (iconsView->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00557                         fileName=iconsView->selectedFile;
00558                         cmdGetIcon->setIcon (QIcon(fileName));
00559                     } else {
00560                         fileName.clear();
00561                     }
00562                 }
00563             } else {
00564                 qDebug()<<"wrestool testing Rejected";
00565                 fileName.clear();
00566             }
00567 
00568             //Clearing temp files
00569             list = tmp.entryInfoList();
00570 
00571                 //Creating file list for converting
00572             for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00573                 QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00574                     if (!QFile::remove(fileInfo.filePath()))
00575                         qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete files at: "<<fileInfo.filePath();
00576             }
00577 
00578             if (!tmp.rmdir(tmpDir))
00579                 qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete tmp dir: "<<tmpDir;
00580         }
00581 
00582         if (!fileName.isEmpty())
00583             iconPath=fileName;
00584     }
00585 
00586     return;
00587 }
00588 
00589 void IconSettings::cmdCancel_Click(){
00590     reject();
00591     return;
00592 }
00593 
00594 void IconSettings::cmdOk_Click(){
00595     QSqlQuery query;
00596 
00597     if (iconName!=txtName->text()){
00598         query.prepare("select id from icon where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id=:dir_id");
00599         query.bindValue(":name", txtName->text());
00600 
00601         if(dir_id.isEmpty())
00602             query.bindValue(":dir_id", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00603         else
00604             query.bindValue(":dir_id", dir_id);
00605 
00606         query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
00607 
00608         query.exec();
00609         query.first();
00610 
00611 
00612         if (query.isValid ()){
00613             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, but icon named %1 already exists.").arg(txtName->text()));
00614             return;
00615         }
00616     }
00617 
00618     if (txtProgramPath->text().isEmpty()){
00619         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("No executiable program selected."));
00620         return;
00621     }
00622 
00623     QString override;
00624     for (int i=1; i<=twDlls->rowCount(); i++){
00625         override.append(tr("%1=").arg(twDlls->item(i-1, 0)->text()));
00626         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Native"))
00627                 override.append("n;");
00628         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Buildin"))
00629                     override.append("b;");
00630         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Native, Buildin"))
00631             override.append("n,b;");
00632         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Buildin, Native"))
00633             override.append("b,n;");
00634     }
00635 
00636 
00637 
00638     switch (newIcon){
00639         case TRUE:
00640             query.prepare("INSERT INTO icon(override, winedebug, useconsole, display, cmdargs, exec, icon_path, desc, dir_id, id, name, prefix_id, wrkdir, desktop, nice) VALUES(:override, :winedebug, :useconsole, :display, :cmdargs, :exec, :icon_path, :desc, :dir_id, NULL, :name, :prefix_id, :wrkdir, :desktop, :nice);");
00641 
00642             if(dir_id.isEmpty())
00643                 query.bindValue(":dir_id", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00644             else
00645                 query.bindValue(":dir_id", dir_id);
00646 
00647             query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
00648         break;
00649         case FALSE:
00650             query.prepare("UPDATE icon SET override=:override, winedebug=:winedebug, useconsole=:useconsole, display=:display,  cmdargs=:cmdargs, exec=:exec, icon_path=:icon_path, desc=:desc, name=:name, wrkdir=:wrkdir, desktop=:desktop, nice=:nice WHERE id=:id;");
00651 
00652             query.bindValue(":id", iconId);
00653         break;
00654     }
00655 
00656     if (override.isEmpty())
00657         query.bindValue(":override", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00658     else
00659         query.bindValue(":override", override);
00660 
00661     if (txtWinedebug->text().isEmpty())
00662         query.bindValue(":winedebug", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00663     else
00664         query.bindValue(":winedebug", txtWinedebug->text());
00665 
00666     if (txtWorkDir->text().isEmpty())
00667         query.bindValue(":wrkdir", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00668     else
00669         query.bindValue(":wrkdir", txtWorkDir->text());
00670 
00671 
00672     if (cbUseConsole->checkState()==Qt::Checked)
00673         query.bindValue(":useconsole", 1);
00674     else
00675         query.bindValue(":useconsole", 0);
00676 
00677     if (txtDisplay->text().isEmpty())
00678         query.bindValue(":display", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00679     else
00680         query.bindValue(":display", txtDisplay->text());
00681 
00682     if (txtCmdArgs->text().isEmpty())
00683         query.bindValue(":cmdargs", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00684     else
00685         query.bindValue(":cmdargs", txtCmdArgs->text());
00686 
00687     if (txtProgramPath->text().isEmpty())
00688         query.bindValue(":exec", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00689     else
00690         query.bindValue(":exec", txtProgramPath->text());
00691 
00692     if (iconPath.isEmpty())
00693         query.bindValue(":icon_path", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00694     else
00695         query.bindValue(":icon_path", iconPath);
00696 
00697     if (txtDesc->text().isEmpty())
00698         query.bindValue(":desc", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00699     else
00700         query.bindValue(":desc", txtDesc->text());
00701 
00702     query.bindValue(":name", txtName->text());
00703 
00704     query.bindValue(":desktop", txtDesktopSize->text());
00705 
00706     query.bindValue(":nice", spinNice->value());
00707 
00708     if (!query.exec()){
00709         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("debug: %1").arg(query.lastError().text()));
00710     }
00711 
00712     accept();
00713     return;
00714 }
